thread.section_title: Its4women Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Its4women | www.its4women.ie
thread.title: Aisling

author: Aisling
title: Aisling
text:
I cancelled my policy during cooling off period. There are 3 areas referencing cancellation on their website and I carefully read before sending, I sent by post the disc certificate and the letter outlining reason for cancellation.
Today I was told they can't cancel as my signature was typed & not handwritten. So I then checked website, no where did it say this, so I then checked terms of business and there it states signed letter. However it doesn't state original handwritten signature on their website in all 3 locations!
I've asked them to accept my initial letter but it's just very frustrating. Feel like I've been conned right from the get go with this crowd!
